title: Challenger Ahri rushes into the 2015 season!

replies.body:
{{champion:103}} I challenge you to a Duel!!!!

{{champion:4}} Bring it on!!!
ITS TIME TO D-D-D-D-DUEL

It's my turn I DRAWWWWWWwwwwww!
{{champion:4}} Blue card NOoooooooo
Yu G* OH oh oh oh oh ...
{{champion:1}} I wanna play too
{{champion:17}}  Captain Teemo on duty to play
{{champion:53}} Fired up and ready to duel
{{champion:157}} dueling, that's a pretty word.
{{champion:254}} duel first, ask questions while dueling
{{champion:114}} I long for a worthy duelist
{{champion:33}} Duel.
{{champion:7}} The Black Rose shal duel once more
{{champion:55}} Dueling solves everything
{{champion:38}} I tried to duel my mother once. Boy did I regret that.
{{champion:150}} <= Duel personality disorder?
{{champion:107}} TONIIIGHT WE DUEL!
{{champion:119}} welcome to the league of dueling
{{champion:236}} Everybody duels,some just need a little help
{{champion:61}} We will duel your enemies, that will be fun
{{champion:122}} They will regret dueling me!
{{champion:36}} mundo duels where he pleases
{{champion:112}} Dueling is perfection.
{{champion:121}} dueling is good
{{champion:26}}  I've seen your duel. It was painful.
{{champion:18}} I wanna duel something
{{champion:80}} It is a pleasure to duel at my feet
{{champion:11}} this will be... a harsh duel
{{champion:268}} follow Shurima, follow dueling.
{{champion:92}} A broken blade can be dueled (well not really)
{{champion:19}} I can smell your duels...
{{champion:37}} >:3
{{champion:30}} dueling, agony, peace. Every person all by itself has beauty
{{champion:29}} I DUELED IT! IT WAS MEEE!
{{champion:238}} the unseen card is the deadliest
{{champion:80}} My profession?! You know, now that I think of it, I've always wanted to be a duelist.
{{champion:90}}  Bow to the Void, or have your Life Points reduced to zero by it

{{champion:103}} I SUMMON 3 {{item:3112}} IN DEF POSITION !
{{champion:4}} I USE EQUITMENT CARD {{item:3100}} , ATK DIRCTECTLY ! BEACH !
{{champion:103}} I use {{summoner:4}} to dodge! YOLO
{{champion:23}} Hi! I'm here to right-click you!

{{champion:103}} puts {{item:3128}} on the graveyard deck- oh wait.
I set one card face-down and end my turn. Your move {{champion:103}}
{{champion:103}} You just activated my trap card.
{{champion:17}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:51}} You Activated My Trap Card
You know for a champion that relies on her charm to seduce and kill men, she is awfully covered up, I don't think anyone would get charmed by her
...if you think charm is about showing skin...you have some issues you may need to get sorted out.

cuz a woman wrapped in a thick jacket and thick pants is totally sexy

amidoingitright?

You misread what I said.  Charm is not about showing skin.  Therefore, charm is not 100% about being sexy.  Her skin is sexy as is, but you don't need to show actual skin to be appealing.  Are you saying that any swimsuit model isn't charming/seductive if she isn't showing as much skin as she normally does (or at all for that matter)?  Charm is more about how you act and talk (and of course her magic does most of it for her anyway).
this is 100% relevant
